website_summaries.verdict: A soft and warm pair of earmuffs with a charming crocheted look that kids love.
pros: These earmuffs have a great look and are available in three styles
Customers praise the softness of the faux fur and how easily the earmuffs stay in place
cons: The plastic band is fragile and prone to breaking

customer_reviews.title: Tight and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Gave it 2 stars because of the colors. Would've given it 1 star. The head band is very hard plastic. The ear muffs are so tight that they are uncomfortable. No way to adjust or fix. My 4 yr old won't wear them because she are tight and hurt her ears. I tried them on myself and it was just as described. Looks like someone crochet over hard plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Pocahontas

customer_reviews.title: Great earmuffs!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 9 year old daughter and she loves them! She refuses to wear a hat anymore (messes up her ponytail) and not having your ears covered during MN winters is not possible. Perfect compromise!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Cute but weak construction
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old loved these muffs when they arrived a week ago. But, the stitching connecting the headband and muff ripped after a few days. We're super disappointed because they were very cute. But, the workmanship is poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Helen F

customer_reviews.title: so soft and loved by my 5 yr old
customer_reviews.text: My daughter asked me for earmuffs and little did she know I had already bought them. These were all of her favorite colors and much better than I had expected. There is faux fur on the inside that is so soft and my daughter wear them like a headband. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: danielle

customer_reviews.title: Love the fuzzy!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 9 years old she absolutely loves them but they have to be extended all the way up to fit her!
customer_reviews.author: Njr

customer_reviews.title: Quality control?
customer_reviews.text: Cute but they came basically broken. I would return them but daughter would be sad. This picture was straight out of the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute and warm. They fit my 5 year old with room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: BMessenger

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have issues with them being broken like other reviews. The left ear was a little “bent” but it was easily straightened out. They fit my 3 year old toddler perfect for our upcoming ski trip this winter!
customer_reviews.author: Tameara

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product! So pretty in the pictures that my unicorn loving daughter was so excited to receive it! She wore it 1 day by the evening of the same day the knitting was coming apart and separated from the knitting connecting it to one of the ears! If I could submit this review with 0 stars I would!
customer_reviews.author: Pallavi R.

customer_reviews.title: Great kids earmuffs
customer_reviews.text: I got the black pair for my son and I did not realize it's got sparkly silver. He doesn't care though, he loves them. He has very sensitive ears and won't wear regular headphones but he loves these. Even sleeps in them
customer_reviews.author: PML13

customer_reviews.title: Daughter wears them every day!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter wears these earmuffs every day. Keeps her ears very warm. Perfect size for her head. Would highly recommend. She has worn every day since Christmas and they are holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle E

customer_reviews.title: Very girly
customer_reviews.text: These earmuffs are perfect for my granddaughter. They are all the pretty colors she loves and very soft. She is learning how to knit so these are perfect
customer_reviews.author: Cathy R

customer_reviews.title: Good fit.
customer_reviews.text: The fit was perfect for my granddaughter and the ear muffs were very soft. I received them when expected.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper2009

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish quality
customer_reviews.text: The fabric connecting the earmuff to the headband broke within seconds of opening, and I forgot to return it in time because it was over Christmas. Buy something better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke easily.
customer_reviews.text: When these first arrived, we loved them- so much so that I immediately ordered another pair for my younger daughter. My daughter used them 3 times and the knit disc on the exterior of the earmuffs is already ripping off.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Cute, OK Quality
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and warm, fit my 6 year old and fit me. They started fraying after minimal use though. Which takes them down a star.
customer_reviews.author: KittyCatC

customer_reviews.title: Well-constructed
customer_reviews.text: Well-constructed. A lot of ear muffs we’ve seen twist easily and don’t stay on. These are sturdy and stay on well. My daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.author: J Hope

customer_reviews.title: My child loves them!  Plastic inside can snap
customer_reviews.text: I did have to replace in a few weeks and got 2 this time. My 6 yr old stuck them in backpack on ride home on bus . they snapped at an ear.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The earr muffs arrived broken :( I'm a teacher who works late and doesn't get off early enough to make it to the post office to return them. My daughter was super excited to receive them only to be disappointed because she can't wear them. Money wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Niya L. Wilks

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk
customer_reviews.text: Bought these and a different pair from a different vendor. These didn't last more than a half hour after my daughter opened them: One earpiece broke off the headband. No way to repair them. Lots of choices out there, buy something different. Wasn't even worth returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loves them. Just a tad big
customer_reviews.author: Candi G.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 year old granddaughter. They are super cute and she loves wearing them! They held up all winter.
customer_reviews.author: Judi M.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: These earmuffs were cute and warm, but they broke after just a few uses! They were not handled roughly at all, the plastic connection (near the junction of the ear and handle) just snapped! Very disappointed that they didn't last longer. My other daughter has a different brand earmuffs and they've lasted much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Mom22

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and soft!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these! She wears them all the time and they fit her perfectly!

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter lived them

customer_reviews.title: Cute, true to picture
customer_reviews.text: These are true to the picture. Fit my 3 year old better than my 8 year old though. Little small in my opinion...good if that's what you're going for.

customer_reviews.title: Basic
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for an upcoming trip to the snow. Price was reasonable but item was basic. They were snug on my 9 year old. They wont fit for much longer and don't have the ability to adjust or make any bigger. These worked fine for a one time trip, but not sure how durable they would be.

product_meta.title: Flammi Kids Knit Earmuffs Winter Outdoor Furry Ear Warmers for Boys Girls
feature_bullets: PLUSH EARMUFFS: Winter warm and cozy earmuffs. The inner surface of the ear portion is made of faux fur that has better heat retention to warm ears and feels very soft, cozy enough to protect kids from cold weather

PRETTY CUTE KNIT EARMUFFS: The warm earmuffs have an amazing look with its eye-catching color. Knitted outer surface perefectly matches the faux fur inner surface, nice, warm and lightweight, not puffy. Great gift idea for children

EASY TO WEAR: Classic type, place the connecting band on your head and make the ear portions cover your ears. You could move the head band slightly forward or backward for better fit. The length of the head band can be adjusted slightly at its ends to fit your head well

ONE SIZE: Unisex Knit Earmuffs for 3-8 Years Old girls and boys (Only For Reference). Diameter of each ear portion: about 3.1"/8cm; Head band connecting ear portions: min. about 11.4"/29cm, max. about 12.2"/31cm (after stretching). Measuring the length of the outer arc of the band

OCCASIONS: Winter accessory for daily wear or special event, kids cold weather earmuffs, warm and good-looking. Matches well with your hats, gloves, scarf and outfits. Take this while skiing, sledding, snowman building, or you are on vacation
